branchCategory.name: SYJA500 & 700, 3-Port Air Operated Valve, All Types
branchCategory.description: <p>A 3 port air operated valve, the SYJA is available in a body ported or base mounted style.  The SYJA's small profile increases design flexibility and minimizes space requirements.</p>
